verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Amraphel <S%H569><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Shinar, <S%H8152><s%> Arioch <S%H746><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Ellasar, <S%H495><s%> Chedorlaomer <S%H3540><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Elam, <S%H5867><s%> and Tidal <S%H8413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of nations; <S%H1471><s%>

That these made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Bera <S%H1298><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> and with <S%H854><s%> Birsha <S%H1306><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> Shinab <S%H8134><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Admah, <S%H126><s%> and Shemeber <S%H8038><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Zeboiim, <S%H6636><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bela, <S%H1106><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Zoar. <S%H6820><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were joined together <S%H2266><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the vale <S%H6010><s%> of Siddim, <S%H7708><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> they served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> Chedorlaomer, <S%H3540><s%> and in the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> they rebelled. <S%H4775><s%>

And in the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> came <S%H935><s%> Chedorlaomer, <S%H3540><s%> and the kings <S%H4428><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> him, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Rephaims <S%H7497><s%> in Ashteroth Karnaim, <S%H6255><s%> and the Zuzims <S%H2104><s%> in Ham, <S%H1990><s%> and the Emims <S%H368><s%> in Shaveh Kiriathaim, <S%H7741><s%>
And the Horites <S%H2752><s%> in their mount <S%H2042><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> El-paran, <S%H364><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H5921><s%> the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And they returned, <S%H7725><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> En-mishpat, <S%H5880><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the country <S%H7704><s%> of the Amalekites, <S%H6003><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Hazezon-tamar. <S%H2688><s%>

And there went out <S%H3318><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Admah, <S%H126><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Zeboiim, <S%H6636><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%> (the same <S%H1931><s%> is Zoar) <S%H6820><s%> and they joined <S%H6186><s%> battle <S%H4421><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them in the vale <S%H6010><s%> of Siddim; <S%H7708><s%>

With <S%H854><s%> Chedorlaomer <S%H3540><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Elam, <S%H5867><s%> and with Tidal <S%H8413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of nations, <S%H1471><s%> and Amraphel <S%H569><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Shinar, <S%H8152><s%> and Arioch <S%H746><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Ellasar; <S%H495><s%> four <S%H702><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> with <S%H854><s%> five. <S%H2568><s%>

And the vale <S%H6010><s%> of Siddim <S%H7708><s%> was full of slime pits; <S%H875><s%> <S%H875><s%> <S%H2564><s%> and the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> and they that remained <S%H7604><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> to the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the goods <S%H7399><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their victuals, <S%H400><s%> and went their way. <S%H1980><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Lot, <S%H3876><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> brother's <S%H251><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> and his goods, <S%H7399><s%> and departed. <S%H1980><s%>

And there came <S%H935><s%> one that had escaped, <S%H6412><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> the Hebrew; <S%H5680><s%> for he <S%H1931><s%> dwelt <S%H7931><s%> in the plain <S%H436><s%> of Mamre <S%H4471><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> of Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> and brother <S%H251><s%> of Aner: <S%H6063><s%> and these <S%H1992><s%> were confederate <S%H1167><s%> <S%H1285><s%> with Abram. <S%H87><s%>

And when Abram <S%H87><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> was taken captive, <S%H7617><s%> he armed <S%H7324><s%> <S%H853><s%> his trained <S%H2593><s%> servants, born <S%H3211><s%> in his own house, <S%H1004><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and eighteen, <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> and pursued <S%H7291><s%> them unto <S%H5704><s%> Dan. <S%H1835><s%>

And he divided himself <S%H2505><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them, he <S%H1931><s%> and his servants, <S%H5650><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> them, and pursued <S%H7291><s%> them unto <S%H5704><s%> Hobah, <S%H2327><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the left hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8040><s%> of Damascus. <S%H1834><s%>

And he brought back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the goods, <S%H7399><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> brought again <S%H7725><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> <S%H853><s%> Lot, <S%H3876><s%> and his goods, <S%H7399><s%> and <S%H853><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him after <S%H310><s%> his return <S%H7725><s%> from the slaughter <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5221><s%> of <S%H853><s%> Chedorlaomer, <S%H3540><s%> and of the kings <S%H4428><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> him, at <S%H413><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Shaveh, <S%H7740><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the king's <S%H4428><s%> dale. <S%H6010><s%>

And Melchizedek <S%H4442><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Salem <S%H8004><s%> brought forth <S%H3318><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and wine: <S%H3196><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> was the priest <S%H3548><s%> of the most high <S%H5945><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Abram <S%H87><s%> of the most high <S%H5945><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> possessor <S%H7069><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth: <S%H776><s%>

And blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the most high <S%H5945><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> which <S%H834><s%> hath delivered <S%H4042><s%> thine enemies <S%H6862><s%> into thy hand. <S%H3027><s%> And he gave <S%H5414><s%> him tithes <S%H4643><s%> of all. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> me the persons, <S%H5315><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> the goods <S%H7399><s%> to thyself.

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> I have lifted up <S%H7311><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the most high <S%H5945><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> the possessor <S%H7069><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth, <S%H776><s%>

That I will not <S%H518><s%> take from a thread <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2339><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> a shoelatchet, <S%H8288><s%> <S%H5275><s%> and that I will not <S%H518><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> any thing <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is thine, lest <S%H3808><s%> thou shouldest say, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> have made Abram rich: <S%H6238><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H87><s%>

Save <S%H1107><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> the young men <S%H5288><s%> have eaten, <S%H398><s%> and the portion <S%H2506><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> which <S%H834><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me, Aner, <S%H6063><s%> Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> and Mamre; <S%H4471><s%> let them <S%H1992><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> their portion. <S%H2506><s%>
